alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Howard (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 9:39PM CDT until May 30 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR HOWARD AND NORTHERN CHICKASAW COUNTIES... At 938 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lime Springs to near New Hampton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Lime Springs around 945 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Protivin and Cresco. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
